Package shop.data

Class Data

java.lang.Object
shop.data.Data
public class Data
extends java.lang.Object
A static class for accessing data objects.

  • Method Details

    • newInventory

      public static final Inventory newInventory()
      Returns a new Inventory.

    • newVideo

      public static Video newVideo​(java.lang.String title, int year, java.lang.String director)
      Factory method for Video objects. Title and director are "trimmed" to remove leading and final space.
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if Video invariant violated.

    • newAddCmd

      public static UndoableCommand newAddCmd​(Inventory inventory, Video video, int change)
      Returns a command to add or remove copies of a video from the inventory.

      The returned command has the following behavior:

      • If a video record is not already present (and change is positive), a record is created.
      • If a record is already present, numOwned is modified using change.
      • If change brings the number of copies to be less than one, the record is removed from the inventory.
      Parameters:
      video - the video to be added.
      change - the number of copies to add (or remove if negative).
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if inventory not created by a call to newInventory.

    • newOutCmd

      public static UndoableCommand newOutCmd​(Inventory inventory, Video video)
      Returns a command to check out a video.
      Parameters:
      video - the video to be checked out.

    • newInCmd

      public static UndoableCommand newInCmd​(Inventory inventory, Video video)
      Returns a command to check in a video.
      Parameters:
      video - the video to be checked in.

    • newClearCmd

      public static UndoableCommand newClearCmd​(Inventory inventory)
      Returns a command to remove all records from the inventory.

    • newUndoCmd

      public static RerunnableCommand newUndoCmd​(Inventory inventory)
      Returns a command to undo that will undo the last successful UndoableCommand.

    • newRedoCmd

      public static RerunnableCommand newRedoCmd​(Inventory inventory)
      Returns a command to redo that last successfully undone command.
